allow: Bash(# Fetch an actual archived API response to see real data curl -s ""https://raw.githubusercontent.com/daydreamer-json/ak-endfield-api-archive/main/output/akEndfield/launcher/game/6/latest.json"")
Bash(# Fetch the patch list to see actual patch URL format curl -s ""https://raw.githubusercontent.com/daydreamer-json/ak-endfield-api-archive/main/output/akEndfield/launcher/game/6/all_patch.json"")

Bash(# Get patch list for Global Windows Official to see a real patch example curl -s ""https://raw.githubusercontent.com/daydreamer-json/ak-endfield-api-archive/main/output/akEndfield/launcher/game/6/list_patch.md"")
